name: Super Cube Pop
description:
Super Cube Pop is a 3D action puzzle game where you rotate the core to group together and explode cubes of the same colour. At the same time you must dispose of the harmful black cubes so the core doesn't become unstable and explode!

Features:

  • Simple, single button controls
  • Fast paced and challenging gameplay
  • Endless play
  • High scores

Updates in v1.1.0:

  • Poppable clusters flash
  • Difficulty balancing
  • Help menu instructions updated
